import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{manageEquipment}from'../thunks/listEquipmentThunk';const initialState={loading:false,equipment:[],error:''};const equipmentSlice=createSlice({name:'equipment',initialState,reducers:{// Synchronous reducers go here if needed
},extraReducers:builder=>{builder.addCase(manageEquipment.pending,state=>{state.loading=true;}).addCase(manageEquipment.fulfilled,(state,action)=>{state.loading=false;state.equipment=action.payload;state.error='';}).addCase(manageEquipment.rejected,(state,action)=>{state.loading=false;state.equipment=[];state.error=action.error.message;});}});export const{reducer:equipmentReducer}=equipmentSlice;export default equipmentSlice.reducer;
